Changelog: 
3.1 
- removed warning on exit since it's no longer neccesary 
- dice selection is a bit more visible now 
- now uses modern style on newer android versions 
- dice selection is now less laggy 
 
3.0 
- proper support for high density displays 
- lots of code cleanup 
 
2.1 
- the reroll button no longer ignores the vibration setting 
- confirmation on app exit now also works on android versions < 2.0 
 
2.0 
- a LOT of code cleanup/restructuring 
- now compatible with android 1.5 and newer 
- new preferences screen 
- persistent storage (player names, selected dice, preferences) 
- roll sound 
- slightly better dice background
